text: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانُ فَٱسۡتَمِعُواْ لَهُۥ وَأَنصِتُواْ لَعَلَّكُمۡ تُرۡحَمُونَ

translation.en: So when the Qur'an is recited, then listen to it and pay attention that you may receive mercy
translation.id: Dan apabila dibacakan Alquran, maka dengarkanlah dan diamlah, agar kamu mendapat rahmat
